import { useContext, useState } from "react" import { CurrentUser } from '../contexts/CurrentUser' function NewCommentForm({ place, onSubmit }) { const { currentUser } = useContext(CurrentUser) const [comment, setComment] = useState({ content: '', stars: 3, rant: false, authorId: authors[0]?.userId }) function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() onSubmit(comment) setComment({ content: '', stars: 3, rant: false }) } if(!currentUser){ return

You must be logged in to leave a rant or rave.
